oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: Coleman's Scouts
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: Secret reunion of Coleman's Scouts, CSA, held in Nashville. L-R, seated: W.M. Roberts, Sam Roberts, Capt. Henry B. Shaw (alias Coleman), J.M. Shute, George D. Hughes. L-R, standing: W.H. Porch, John G. Davis, and Robert F. Cotton.
Sam Davis, brother of John G. Davis and "boy hero of the Confederacy," was a member of this unit.
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:subject: Photomontage; Armed Forces--Officers; Reunions
